channel.title: Yuri and The Rack question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Yuri and The Rack question"

item.title: Re: Yuri and The Rack question
item.content:encoded: Actually, the Lvl. 2 girl power teams work now. They didn't used to, but that was a bug that's been fixed.

item.title: Re: Yuri and The Rack question
item.content:encoded: No it wouldn't. The Level 2's don't count as female (don't ask.) Just as having any level 2 character means you can't use whatever team bonus they had as level 1.

item.title: Re: Yuri and The Rack question
item.content:encoded: This special Team would be a Girl Power Team: +1 Levels.

item.title: Re: Yuri and The Rack question
item.content:encoded:
A Pinky 2, Rack, Yuri team would have no team bonus, but instead the following bonuses:

  • +6 Tai Strength
  • Jutsu Chakra costs are 15% less
  • Get one Stamina per mission
  • +1 Nin Level
  • +1 Nin Strength

Team's are exact. You can't have more or less characters in them to get the bonus.

item.title: Yuri and The Rack question
item.content:encoded: Because Yuri's ability, not team bonus, is to negate The Rack's weakness, would it be possible to make a team with Pinky lvl2, The Rack, and Yuri to do missions for free or would the Perfect Pair team supersede Femme Fatales?
